3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; perspective is a clean isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Basic layout of core rooms is preserved, but the left-side dining terrace/porch from the 2D plan is missing. Wall partitions align well with the main core.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture blocks are present and logically placed, though simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and clear material separation; background is clean and text-free.

detected_errors.description: The outdoor dining/terrace section on the far left of the 2D floor plan is missing from the 3D model.
Double entry doors at the bottom of the plan are rendered as a simple wall/opening.

summary: A highly accurate isometric 3D reconstruction that maintains the spatial logic of the interior, despite omitting the exterior accessory spaces.
